Description:
Parisima Talent is hiring with one of our clients in hospitality.Position: Restaurant Manager / Assistant Restaurant ManagerJob location: Dubai, UAEResponsibilities:Oversee daily restaurant operations.
Collaborate with chefs to develop and update menus based on customer preferences and market trends.
Set menu prices that balance profitability with customer value.
Manage staff, training, and scheduling.
Develop and execute marketing strategies.
Maintain compliance with local regulations.
Monitor and optimize inventory.
Create and analyze financial reports.Skills
Skills:
Proven experience in restaurant management.
Relevant experience as a Restaurant Manager / Assistant Restaurant Manager / Restaurant Supervisor.
Strong leadership skills.
